message.content:
Subject: Farewell Notice – My Transition from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. It is with a mix of excitement and nostalgia that I write to inform you of my decision to leave [Company Name], effective [Last Working Day, typically two weeks from the date of the email]. This has been a difficult decision for me, as my time here has been both professionally rewarding and personally enriching.

During my tenure at [Company Name], I have gained invaluable experience and developed skills that will undoubtedly shape my future endeavors. The knowledge and relationships forged here have been instrumental in my professional growth, and for that, I am deeply grateful.

As we transition through the coming weeks, I am committed to doing everything possible to ensure a smooth handover of my responsibilities. I would appreciate the opportunity to work closely with [specific team member or department] to facilitate this process and maintain the continuity of our projects.

I am confident that under your leadership, [Company Name] will continue to thrive and achieve great success. It has been an honor to be part of such a dynamic organization, and I look forward to witnessing the company's future achievements from the outside.

Please feel free to reach out if you need further details or assistance during this period. Thank you for your understanding and support as I prepare to embark on this new chapter in my career.

Warm regards,

[Your Full Name]
[Your Job Title]
[Contact Information]
